name: Blue Magic - Evolution I Waterbed Hardside Cover

reviews.name: Blue Magic - Evolution I Waterbed Hardside Cover
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are first time water bed owners. We were desperate for something that might help his very bad back. We could not have asked for a better result! We have pets and were worried about them damaging our bed - this cover was exactly what we needed!
reviews.title: Great comfort!

reviews.name: Blue Magic - Evolution I Waterbed Hardside Cover
reviews.reviewText: This cover is a bit pricy, but it is definately better than a normal waterbed mattress pad. keeps in the warmth, so energy costs should be better, and also doesn't rob body heat like most thin waterbed mattress pads
reviews.title: Pricy but better than a normal mattress pad

reviews.name: Blue Magic - Evolution I Waterbed Hardside Cover
reviews.reviewText:
This waterbed cover is heavenly! I've had waterbeds in the past and used traditional covers. This is far superior. The bottom is also the liner and the quilted top zips on easily. Thick quilting is very comfortable and stays in place all night.

For installation my partner and I put the liner in the bed and taped it with electrical tape to hold the sides up while installing and filling the waterbed bladder. We then zipped on the top. Easy to do.

Price was half of that at the local mattress store.
reviews.title: Great sleeping on this waterbed cover!

reviews.name: Blue Magic - Evolution I Waterbed Hardside Cover
reviews.reviewText:
A beautiful stitched comfortable finish to make a safe cover for protecting mattress from damage. Was very pleased with the quality. The single zipper -- one way open, one way shut -- was the only drawback.
Followed suggestion from another purchaser about taping cover's sides to frame and then laying in the water bladder. Worked great.
reviews.title: Perfect compliment to traditional waterbed
